element-type.name: rowLayout
element-type.description: RowLayout components can be used on their own, or to define a row of a tableLayout component.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: halign
attribute-type.description: the default horizontal alignment of cells in this row. The acceptable values are "center", "left", "right", "start", and "end".

attribute-type.name: valign
attribute-type.description: the default vertical alignment of cells in this row. The acceptable values are "middle", "top", and "bottom".

attribute-type.name: width
attribute-type.description: the preferred total width of the layout. This attribute is ignored when the row layout is inside of a table layout.

attribute-type.name: shortDesc
attribute-type.description: the short description of the bean. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.

attribute-type.name: partialTriggers
attribute-type.description: the IDs of the components that should trigger a partial update. This component will listen on the trigger components. If one of the trigger components receives an event that will cause it to update in some way, this component will request to be updated too.

attribute-type.name: onclick
attribute-type.description: an onclick Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: ondblclick
attribute-type.description: an ondblclick Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: an onmousedown Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmouseup
attribute-type.description: an onmouseup Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmouseover
attribute-type.description: an onmouseover Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: an onmousemove Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmouseout
attribute-type.description: an onmouseout Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onkeypress
attribute-type.description: an onkeypress Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onkeydown
attribute-type.description: an onkeydown Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onkeyup
attribute-type.description: an onkeyup Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: the CSS style class of the bean.

attribute-type.name: inlineStyle
attribute-type.description: the inline CSS style for this element

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: whether the bean is rendered. When set to false, no output will be delivered for this bean.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: a binding reference to store the component instance

attribute-type.name: attributeChangeListener
attribute-type.description: a method reference to an attribute change listener

element-type.name: styleSheet
element-type.description: The styleSheet tag generates the style sheet link reference to a generated ADF Faces style sheet. This is automatically included for you if you use the ADF head tag.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: whether the bean is rendered. When set to false, no output will be delivered for this bean.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: a binding reference to store the component instance

attribute-type.name: attributeChangeListener
attribute-type.description: a method reference to an attribute change listener

element-type.name: tableLayout
element-type.description: <html> A TableLayout is a thin wrapper around the HTML <table> element. It contains a series of row layout elements. </html>

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: width
attribute-type.description: the preferred total width of the layout.

attribute-type.name: halign
attribute-type.description: the horizontal alignment of the table. The acceptable values are "center", "left", "right", "start", and "end".

attribute-type.name: cellSpacing
attribute-type.description: the spacing between cells.

attribute-type.name: cellPadding
attribute-type.description: the spacing within cells.

attribute-type.name: borderWidth
attribute-type.description: the border width around each cell.

attribute-type.name: summary
attribute-type.description: The summary of the table's purpose and structure for user agents rendering to non-visual media. This attribute must be set if this element is being used to implement a data table (instead of a layout table).

attribute-type.name: shortDesc
attribute-type.description: the short description of the bean. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.

attribute-type.name: partialTriggers
attribute-type.description: the IDs of the components that should trigger a partial update. This component will listen on the trigger components. If one of the trigger components receives an event that will cause it to update in some way, this component will request to be updated too.

attribute-type.name: onclick
attribute-type.description: an onclick Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: ondblclick
attribute-type.description: an ondblclick Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: an onmousedown Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmouseup
attribute-type.description: an onmouseup Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmouseover
attribute-type.description: an onmouseover Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: an onmousemove Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onmouseout
attribute-type.description: an onmouseout Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onkeypress
attribute-type.description: an onkeypress Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onkeydown
attribute-type.description: an onkeydown Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onkeyup
attribute-type.description: an onkeyup Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: the CSS style class of the bean.

attribute-type.name: inlineStyle
attribute-type.description: the inline CSS style for this element

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: whether the bean is rendered. When set to false, no output will be delivered for this bean.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: a binding reference to store the component instance

element-type.name: frame
element-type.description: The frame component is used to specify attributes needed by an HTML frame.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: source
attribute-type.description: the URI for the source of this frame

attribute-type.name: longDescURL
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies a link to a long description of the frame. This description should supplement the short description provided using the shortDesc attribute, and may be particularly useful for non-visual user agents.

attribute-type.name: name
attribute-type.description: the name used to identify this frame

attribute-type.name: width
attribute-type.description: the proposed width of this frame This can be in pixels or percentage. This attribute is used only if this frame is a left/right facet of a frameBorderLayout component.

attribute-type.name: height
attribute-type.description: the proposed height of this frame. This can be in pixels or percentage. This attribute is used only if this frame is a top/bottom facet of a frameBorderLayout component.

attribute-type.name: marginWidth
attribute-type.description: the width of the frame margin. The value must be greater than zero (pixels).

attribute-type.name: marginHeight
attribute-type.description: the width of the frame margin. The value must be greater than zero (pixels).

attribute-type.name: scrolling
attribute-type.description:
whether or not scrollbars are available on this frame. Valid values for this attribute are the following constants:

"yes" specifies that scrollbars are always available.

"no" specifies that scrollbars are never available.

"auto" specifies that the browser determines whether to display scroll bars based on the size of the frame and its content. If you do not specify a value for scrolling, the default value is "auto"

attribute-type.name: shortDesc
attribute-type.description: the short description of the bean. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.

attribute-type.name: partialTriggers
attribute-type.description: the IDs of the components that should trigger a partial update. This component will listen on the trigger components. If one of the trigger components receives an event that will cause it to update in some way, this component will request to be updated too.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: the CSS style class of the bean.

attribute-type.name: inlineStyle
attribute-type.description: the inline CSS style for this element

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: whether the bean is rendered. When set to false, no output will be delivered for this bean.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: a binding reference to store the component instance

attribute-type.description: a method reference to an attribute change listener

element-type.name: html
element-type.description: <html> The html tag generates the <html> element for an HTML page. </html>

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: whether the bean is rendered. When set to false, no output will be delivered for this bean.

attribute-type.name: binding

attribute-type.description: a method reference to an attribute change listener

element-type.name: body
element-type.description: Tag for the HTML body element.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: firstClickPassed
attribute-type.description:
whether or not ADF will allow the first click to go through in certain instances. When a PPR event occurs, we block all subsequent user input until it completes. However, there may be instances where the client wants to receive the very first click. For example, if the user entered text in an inputText that fires a PPR request, then the user immediately clicked a submit button two events will be triggered - an onchange followed by an onclick. The onchange will trigger the client action which will immediately start the PPR blocking, so the onclick will get consumed by the blocking code and no submit will occur. Setting this value to true will allow the click to go through.
This attribute is not supported on the following agent types: pda, phone, voice.

attribute-type.description: the short description of the bean. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.

attribute-type.name: partialTriggers
attribute-type.description: the IDs of the components that should trigger a partial update. This component will listen on the trigger components. If one of the trigger components receives an event that will cause it to update in some way, this component will request to be updated too.

attribute-type.name: inlineStyle

attribute-type.name: onload
attribute-type.description: an onload Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onunload
attribute-type.description: an onunload Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: initialFocusId
attribute-type.description:
the id of the component to which you want the focus to be when the full page renders. The accessibility-mode must be set to "inaccessible" for this feature to be on.
This attribute is not supported on the following agent types: pda, phone, voice.

element-type.name: script
element-type.description: The script component supports importing libraries, and inline scripts.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: text
attribute-type.description: the inline script

attribute-type.name: source
attribute-type.description: the URI of a script library to import.

attribute-type.name: generatesContent
attribute-type.description: if the script generates content using document.write() or document.writeln(), set this to true. It defaults to false.

attribute-type.name: partialTriggers
attribute-type.description: the IDs of the components that should trigger a partial update. This component will listen on the trigger components. If one of the trigger components receives an event that will cause it to update in some way, this component will request to be updated too.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: whether the bean is rendered. When set to false, no output will be delivered for this bean.

attribute-type.description: a method reference to an attribute change listener

element-type.name: frameBorderLayout
element-type.description: frameBorderLayout is a layout bean which can be used to place seven frames at left, right, top, bottom, innerLeft, innerRight and center positions.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: onload
attribute-type.description: an onload Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: onunload
attribute-type.description: an onunload Javascript handler.

attribute-type.name: width
attribute-type.description: The proposed width of this frameBorderLayout. This can be in pixels or percentage. This attribute is used only if this a nested frameBorderLayout in a left/right facet of a frameBorderLayout.

attribute-type.name: height
attribute-type.description: The proposed height of this frameBorderLayout. This can be in pixels or percentage. This attribute is used only if this a nested frameBorderLayout in a top/bottom facet of a frameBorderLayout.

attribute-type.name: shortDesc
attribute-type.description: the short description of the bean. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.

attribute-type.name: partialTriggers
attribute-type.description: the IDs of the components that should trigger a partial update. This component will listen on the trigger components. If one of the trigger components receives an event that will cause it to update in some way, this component will request to be updated too.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: the CSS style class of the bean.

attribute-type.description: the inline CSS style for this element

attribute-type.description: whether the bean is rendered. When set to false, no output will be delivered for this bean.

element-type.name: head
element-type.description: Tag for the HTML head element.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: The title of the document. (This title doesn't have to match the title on any contained panelPage.)

attribute-type.name: partialTriggers
attribute-type.description: the IDs of the components that should trigger a partial update. This component will listen on the trigger components. If one of the trigger components receives an event that will cause it to update in some way, this component will request to be updated too.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: whether the bean is rendered. When set to false, no output will be delivered for this bean.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: a binding reference to store the component instance

attribute-type.name: attributeChangeListener
attribute-type.description: a method reference to an attribute change listener

element-type.name: cellFormat
element-type.description: CellFormat components are used to format cells in a rowLayout component.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: the identifier for the component

attribute-type.name: shortText
attribute-type.description: This attribute should be used to provide an abbreviated form of the cell's content, and may be rendered by user agents when appropriate in place of the cell's content. Abbreviated names should be short since user agents may render them repeatedly (especially if this cell is a header cell).

attribute-type.name: halign
attribute-type.description: the horizontal alignment of the grid row elements. The acceptable values are "center", "left", "right", "start", and "end".

attribute-type.name: valign
attribute-type.description: the vertical alignment of the grid row elements. The acceptable values are "middle", "top", and "bottom".

attribute-type.name: width
attribute-type.description: the preferred width of the enclosed layout elements.

attribute-type.name: height
attribute-type.description: the preferred height of the enclosed layout elements.

attribute-type.name: columnSpan
attribute-type.description: the number of cells wide the child layout element will be.

attribute-type.name: rowSpan
attribute-type.description: the number of cells high the child layout element will be.

attribute-type.name: wrappingDisabled
attribute-type.description: whether automatic text wrapping should be disabled for this cell.

attribute-type.name: headers
attribute-type.description: Indicates which table cells are the headers for this cell. This attribute is used by screen readers to associate header information with data cells. This must be set to a space-separated list of IDs. Each ID must be the ID of a pertinent header cell.

attribute-type.name: header
attribute-type.description: Indicates whether or not this table cell is a header cell or a data cell. Setting this attribute to 'true' will mark this cell as a header cell.

attribute-type.name: shortDesc
attribute-type.description: the short description of the bean. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.

attribute-type.name: partialTriggers
attribute-type.description: the IDs of the components that should trigger a partial update. This component will listen on the trigger components. If one of the trigger components receives an event that will cause it to update in some way, this component will request to be updated too.

attribute-type.description: an onclick Javascript handler.

attribute-type.description: an ondblclick Javascript handler.

attribute-type.description: an onmousedown Javascript handler.
